login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Sign into Revolt
login.log_out_other: Log out of all other sessions
login.email_delay: We've sent you a verification email. Please allow up to 10 minutes for it to arrive.
login.check_spam: Please check your spam folder if you can't find it

home.join-testers_desc: You can report issues and discuss improvements with us directly here.
home.goto-testers_desc: You can report issues and discuss improvements with us directly here.
home.donate_desc: Support the project by donating - thank you!
home.feedback_desc: Let us know how we can improve our app by giving us feedback.
home.settings-tooltip: You can also right-click the user icon in the top left, or left click it if you're already home.
home.discover_desc: Find a community based on your hobbies or interests.
home.group_desc: Invite all of your friends, some cool bots, and throw a big party.

start.group: This is the start of your conversation.
start.saved: This is the start of your notes.

misc.not_loaded: Message not loaded, click to jump
misc.no_sending: You don't have permission to send messages in this channel.

channel.marked: This channel is marked as NSFW.

nsfw.confirm: I confirm that I am at least 18 years old.

channel.bridged: Message was sent on another platform

errors.title: Oops, there's nothing here!
errors.nochannels: This server has no channels, or you don't have access to any.

account.title: My Account
account.unique_id: This is a unique user identifier for your account.

2fa.title: Two-factor Authentication
2fa.description: Add an extra layer of security by enabling 2FA on your account.
2fa.view_recovery_long: View and download your 2FA recovery codes.
2fa.generate_recovery_long: Get ready to use 2FA by setting up a recovery method.
2fa.two_factor_off: You have not enabled two-factor authentication!

manage.title: Account Management
manage.description: Disable or delete your account at any time. Both actions will log you out of your active sessions.
manage.disable_description: You won't be able to access your account unless you contact support - however, your data will not be deleted.
manage.delete_description: Your account and all of your data (including your messages and friends list) will be queued for deletion. A confirmation email will be sent - you can cancel this within 7 days by contacting support.

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.logout: Log out of all other sessions

audio.title: Voice Settings
audio.tip_retry: You didn't give Revolt permission to access your microphone. Please {{retryBtn}}.
audio.tip_grant_permission: You need to grant permission to access audio settings.

appearance.title: Appearance

discover.title: Discover Themes
discover.description: Browse themes made by the community

appearance_options.title: Appearance Options
appearance_options.show_send_desc: If this is disabled, the Send Message button will only appear on mobile.
appearance_options.show_account_age: Always show account age next to join messages
appearance_options.show_account_age_desc: If this is disabled, the account age will only be shown for new users.

theme_options.title: Theme Options
theme_options.follow_desc: If this is enabled, you won't be able to change your theme or use a custom theme.
theme_options.seasonal_desc: Displays effects in the home tab during holiday seasons.
theme_options.transparency_desc: Enables transparency effects throughout the app.

appearance.ligatures_desc: For supported fonts, ligatures combine characters together - for example, turning -> into an arrow.

descriptions.reduced_motion: If this is enabled, animations and motion effects won't play or will be less intense.

descriptions.enable_desktop: If this is enabled, you will receive notifications while the app is open.
descriptions.enable_push: If this is enabled, you will receive notifications when you're offline.

descriptions.appearance: This will sync appearance options, such as your chosen emoji pack and message density.
descriptions.theme: This will sync your chosen theme, colours and any custom CSS.
descriptions.locale: This will sync your currently chosen language.

experiments.title: Experiments
experiments.not_available: No experiments are available at this time.

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.wip: Warning: this feature is still in development.

bots.title: My Bots
bots.unique_id: This is a unique identifier for your bot. This is not the bot's token.
bots.public_bot_tip: This bot is public. Anyone can invite it.
bots.private_bot_tip: This bot is private. Only you can invite it.
bots.public_bot_desc: If this is enabled, other users can add this bot to servers and group messages.
bots.reserved: Note: this field is reserved for the future.

theme_shop.title: Theme Shop
theme_shop.description: Browse hundreds of themes, created and curated by the community.

messaging_edit_previous_message.title: Edit previous message
messaging_edit_previous_message.description: Edit the previously sent message in the currently loaded messaging view.

auto_complete_up.title: Previous Autocomplete Selection
auto_complete_up.description: Move the autocomplete selection to the previous one.

auto_complete_down.title: Next Autocomplete Selection
auto_complete_down.description: Move the autocomplete selection to the next one.

input_submit.title: Submit Input
input_submit.description:
An advanced keybind that is typically used to submit the current input.
This may include submitting a message, submitting an edit to a message, submitting a search, etc..

input_cancel.title: Cancel Input
input_cancel.description:
An advanced keybind that is typically used to cancel the current input.
This may include cancelling a message edit, removing a queued image, or similar scenarios.

input_force_submit.title: Force Submit Input
input_force_submit.description:
An advanced keybind that is typically used to forcefully submit the current input, ignoring some checks or other keybinds.
This may include submitting a message instead of confirming the autocomplete selection.

messaging_scroll_to_bottom.title: Scroll to bottom of messages
messaging_scroll_to_bottom.description: Scrolls to the bottom of the messaging view.

messaging_mark_channel_read.title: Mark channel as read
messaging_mark_channel_read.description: Marks the current channel as read.

navigate_previous_context.title: Navigate to the previous context
navigate_previous_context.description: An advanced keybind that is typically used to close the setting page, a modal, or a popup and return back to the previous context.

developer_toggle_all_experiments.title: Toggle experiment safe mode
developer_toggle_all_experiments.description: This will enable / disable all experiments at once.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.suggest_desc: Suggest new Revolt features on GitHub discussions.
feedback.issue_desc: To help us more easily triage issues, you can create an issue on GitHub.
feedback.bug_desc: View currently active bug reports here.

account.a: Want to customise your public profile?
account.b: Head over to your profile settings.

languages.a: Are we missing a language you want?
languages.b: Help us out by contributing more translations.

sessions.a: If you see an unknown session on the list,
sessions.b: secure your account by changing your password and setting up 2FA.

clipboard.https: You are currently not in a HTTPS context.

onboarding.pick: Pick a username that you want people to be able to find you by. This can be changed later in your user settings.

prompt.confirm_leave_long: You won't be able to rejoin unless you are re-invited.
prompt.confirm_close_dm_long: You can re-open it later, but it will disappear on both sides.
prompt.confirm_delete_long: Once it's deleted, there's no going back.
prompt.confirm_delete_message_long: Are you sure you want to delete this?
prompt.create_invite_created: Here is your new invite code:
prompt.confirm_kick: Are you sure you want to kick {{name}}?
prompt.unfriend_user_long: You may not be able to talk to them again until you add them back.
prompt.block_user_long: Are you sure you want to block {{name}}? They will also be removed from your friends list.
prompt.members_not_notified: Other members will not be notified

mfa.save_codes: Please save these to a safe location.
mfa.confirm: Please confirm this action using the selected method.
mfa.select_method: Please select a method to authenticate your request.
mfa.prompt_totp: Please scan or use the token below in your authenticator app.

out_of_date.title: Your client is out of date!
out_of_date.description: It must be updated in order to work with recent changes.
out_of_date.version: Your client is at {{client}}, but the server requires {{server}}.

external_links.title: External links can be dangerous!
external_links.short: Are you sure you want to go to:

sessions.title: Are you sure you want to clear your sessions?

report.thank_you: Thank you for helping to keep Revolt safe. We will review your report as soon as possible.
report.block_user: Would you like to block this user?

content_reason.Illegal: Content breaks one or more laws
content_reason.PromotesHarm: Content promotes harm to others or self
content_reason.SpamAbuse: This is spam or platform abuse
content_reason.Harassment: This is harassment or abuse targeted at another user

user_reason.SpamAbuse: User is sending spam or otherwise abusing the platform
user_reason.InappropriateProfile: User's profile is inappropriate for a general audience
user_reason.Impersonation: This user is impersonating someone else
user_reason.BanEvasion: This user is evading a ban
user_reason.Underage: This user is not old enough to have an account

user_profile.empty: It's a bit empty in here…

special.requires_online: You need to be online to view this.

invite.invalid_desc: The invite may not exist, or you don't have permission to join.

error.AlreadySentRequest: Already sent a request to this user.
error.FailedToReceive: Server failed to receive your file.
error.UnsupportedBrowser: Browser is missing support for this feature.
error.DeniedNotification: You denied notification access. Check page settings.
error.ReachedMaximumBots: You've reached the maximum amount of bots.
error.AudioPermissionBlock: No access to your microphone. Please check your browser's configuration.

ManageChannels.d: Allows members to create, edit and delete channels.

ManageServer.d: Allows members to change this server's name, description, icon and other related information.

ManagePermissions.d: Allows members to change permissions for channels and roles with a lower ranking.

ManageRole.d: Allows members to create, edit and delete roles with a lower rank than theirs, and modify role permissions on channels.

ManageCustomisation.d: Allows members to create, edit and delete emojis.

KickMembers.d: Allows members to remove members from this server. Kicked members may rejoin with an invite.

BanMembers.d: Allows members to permanently remove members from this server.

TimeoutMembers.d: Allows members to temporarily prevent users from interacting with the server.

AssignRoles.d: Allows members to assign roles below their own rank to other members.

ChangeNickname.d: Allows members to change their nickname on this server.

ManageNicknames.d: Allows members to change the nicknames of other members.

ChangeAvatar.d: Allows members to change their avatar on this server.

RemoveAvatars.d: Allows members to remove the server avatars of other members on this server.

ViewChannel.d: Allows members to view any channels they have this permission on.

ReadMessageHistory.d: Allows members to read the message history of this channel.

SendMessage.d: Allows members to send messages in text channels.

ManageMessages.d: Allows members to delete messages sent by other members.

ManageWebhooks.d: Allows members to control webhooks in a channel.

ManageChannel.d: Allows members to edit or delete a channel.

InviteOthers.d: Allows members to invite other users to a channel.

SendEmbeds.d: Allows members to send embedded content, whether from links or custom text embeds.

UploadFiles.d: Allows members to upload files in text channels.

Masquerade.d: Allows members to change their name and avatar per-message.

React.d: Allows members to react to messages.

Connect.d: Allows members to connect to a voice channel.

Speak.d: Allows members to speak in a voice channel.

Video.d: Allows members to stream video in a voice channel.

MuteMembers.d: Allows members to mute others in a voice channel.

DeafenMembers.d: Allows members to deafen others in a voice channel.

MoveMembers.d: Allows members to move others between voice channels.
